sentences.en: Ancestral Spirit - Allows a Spirit Walker to resurrect dead non - Hero Tauren.
sentences.cn: 先古之魂-灵魂行者可以复活 非 英雄(的)牛头人.

sentences.en: Ancestral Spirit - Allows a Spirit Walker to resurrect dead non - Hero Tauren.
sentences.cn: 先古之魂-灵魂行者可以复活 非 英雄的牛头人.

sentences.en: Angel who wanted to resurrect Shaher. Was killed by Alphonse in the Garden of Memories.
sentences.cn: 致力于让贾哈尔苏醒的堕落天使,在追忆的庭园被阿尔丰斯杀死.

sentences.en: another failed attempt to resurrect his career
sentences.cn: 他重振事业的又一次失败尝试

sentences.en: Archangels can use Resurrect only once during a combat.
sentences.cn: 在一场战斗中,大天使只能使用一次复活.

sentences.en: Attempts to resurrect the ceasefire have already failed once.
sentences.cn: 为再次停火作出的努力已经失败了一次。

sentences.en: Biood of the enemy , forcibly taken you will resurrect your foe.
sentences.cn: 仇敌的血,被迫献出, 可使你的敌人复活.

sentences.en: In a few cases, I tried to resurrect some of the executives.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下, 我也想让有些高级职员改弦更张.

sentences.en: Mass Resurrect: Like Resurrect, but works on multiple friendly souls simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 群体复活: 类似于复活,但同时对多个目标有效.

sentences.en: One can then resurrect and reconstitute all molecules.
sentences.cn: 随后你就能重建所有的分子.

sentences.en: Resurrect spells come at later levels.
sentences.cn: 复活技能属于高等级技能.

sentences.en: That noise is enough to resurrect the dead!
sentences.cn: 那噪音都能把死人吵活!

sentences.en: The air network performance can be called " resurrect. "
sentences.cn: 此次空中网业绩可谓是 “ 起死回生 ”.

sentences.en: The Home Office have resurrected plans to build a new prison just outside London.
sentences.cn: 内政部重新提出了在伦敦市外建一座监狱的计划。

sentences.en: To resurrect the dead, power He gave you.
sentences.cn: 复兴死了, 他给了你的力量.

sentences.en: Tynam had killed Radenbaugh to resurrect him Miller.
sentences.cn: 泰纳恩一笔勾销了雷登堡,让米勒“借尸还魂”.

sentences.en: We must resurrect market discipline as a complement to prudential supervision.
sentences.cn: 我们必须恢复市场纪律,使之成为对审慎监管的补充.

trans.tran_en: to bring back an old activity, belief, idea etc that has not existed for a long time

trans.tran_cn: 使复活，复兴，重新使用，挖出
